DOC.detailed_description: About one-fourth preterm infant weight less 2 3/4 pound birth develop eye problem . This problem occur retina ( back eye ) may result blindness . This eye problem call retinopathy prematurity ( ROP ) . There two yellow pigment retina call lutein zeaxanthin . These pigment may protect retina damaged light . They may also protect retina damage oxygen . These pigment transfer mother baby . Most take place last trimester pregnancy . The situation could worse baby receives formula . Most baby formula contain lutein zeaxanthin ; breast milk . Another worry breast milk may enough lutein zeaxanthin mother eat enough vegetable fruit . The purpose study measure transfer lutein zeaxanthin mother baby , measure amount lutein zeaxanthin breast milk , find take lutein supplement increase amount lutein breast milk find dietary lutein zeaxanthin involve development retinopathy prematurity ( ROP ) .
DOC.criteria: Planning breast feed least 12 week Willing randomized take lutein supplement Insufficient quantity breast milk
